intro: En peru prabhakar, nan oru Tamil M.A graduate, ana enaku indha society la periya mariyadha ila. Yen nalla mark vaanguna pasanga tamil padicha thappa? En vaazhka oru periya kadha, pala sogangal, konjam sandhosam. En maranamaavadhu nala irukanum nu asa paten. Ena pathi keela inum neraiya iruju, so idhan en vaalzhka, Idhan Naan
